CustomField.description: For FDR, a description of this Internal Status Code value
CustomField.formula: CASE( Internal_Status__c , 'D', 'Delinquent', 'O', 'Over Limit', 'N', 'Credit Balance', 'X', 'Delinquent and Over Limit', 'Normal or credit balance')
CustomField.inlineHelpText: For FDR, a description of this Internal Status Code value
CustomField.label: Internal Status Description
